name: JIF® Irresistible Peanut Butter Cookies
author: Jif
summary: The classic peanut butter cookie made even more irresistible with JIF® Peanut Butter!
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups firmly packed light brown sugar
½ cup Butter Flavor CRISCO® Stick
directions: Place sheets of foil on countertop for cooling cookies
Combine brown sugar, JIF® peanut butter, shortening, milk and vanilla in large bowl
Beat at medium speed of electric mixer until well blended
Combine flour, baking soda and salt
Add to creamed mixture at low speed
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheet
Flatten slightly in crisscross pattern with tines of fork
Bake one baking sheet at a time for 7-8 minutes or until set and just beginning to brown
Remove cookies to foil to cool completely
